snippet.title: Murder Cases - Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
"You find yourself locked in your own home, in the middle of a crime scene, and without your recent memories. In this horror scenario, you will find a stranger wandering the house and making your escape unlikely. Solve all the puzzles, find out what happened, and recover your missing memories."

Follow us on Twitter: @SolvendoGames

Music by Brandon Lee Purvis
